
```{r}
football_matches <- read.csv("~/Datawise/Machine Learning/premier_league_dataset - df_full_premierleague.csv")

head(football_matches)
```

```{r}
class(football_matches$sg_match_ft)
```
```{r}
football_matches <- football_matches %>%
  mutate(result = case_when(
    sg_match_ft >= 1 ~ 0, # Home win
    sg_match_ft <= -1 ~ 1, # Away win
    sg_match_ft == 0 ~ 2, # Draw
    TRUE ~ NA_integer_
  ))

head(football_matches)
unique(football_matches$home_team)
```
